text: katalttiratt sthiticeytirunna a pattanattepparri ni avareat ceadicc neakku. (atayatâ€Œ) sabbatt dinam (saniyalca) acarikkunnatil avar atikramam kaniccirunna sandarbhattepparri. avarute sabbatt dinattil avarkk avasyamulla matsyannal vellattinu mite talakaniccukeant avarute atutt varukayum avarkk sabbatt acarikkanillatta divasattil avarute atutt ava varatirikkukayum ceytirunnasandarbham. avar dhikkariccirunnatinre phalamayi aprakaram nam avare pariksikkukayayirunnu
